name: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce platform with user authentication, product management, shopping cart, and payment integration.

name: Task Management App
description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: A responsive weather dashboard that provides real-time weather information, forecasts, and interactive maps using external APIs.

name: Social Media Clone
description: A social media application with user profiles, post creation, likes, comments, and real-time notifications.

name: Portfolio Website
description: A modern and responsive portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and experience with smooth animations and dark mode.

name: Blog Platform
description: A full-featured blog platform with markdown support, content management, SEO optimization, and comment system.
